functional.notes: Baseline detector produces non-empty detections on UAT clip (acceptance: >=10 frames with confidence>=0.6). Conservative gating prefers missing over wrong.

correctness_safety.notes: Trust-first: no hallucination; returns [] when image_bytes is None or invalid; blob-like gating reduces false positives.

performance.notes: Subsampling via sample_step_px reduces grid scan cost; blob window is bounded by radius.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/ball/detector.py blob window radius is explicit constant

security.notes: No external calls; pure image buffer processing; bounds checks on frame dimensions.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/ball/detector.py validates image_bytes length against expected decode dimensions

maintainability.notes: Explicit config dataclass; diagnostics include all key parameters for audits.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/ball/detector.py:detect returns diagnostics with method, luma, sat, blob_ratio keys

summary.notes: Conservative baseline detector with strong trust-first guarantees.
